text: The Lilac Serenade is the debut album by post-hardcore band Of Blessings and Burdens. It was recorded around the time the band had changed their name from Substatic to OBAB. Shortly before the album being recorded, Dave Marcus joined replacing then Guitarist, Josh Mann who had recently left the band. == Track listing == ==Personnel== *Ryan Tyree – Vocals/Guitar *Dave Marcus – Vocals/Guitar *Chris Richardson – Drums *Jack Strong – Bass Category:Of Blessings and Burdens albums Category:2003 debut albums
title: The Lilac Serenade
